2.5.0 - May 1st 2016¶

  • [fd4ba39136] - 2.5.0 (Julian Gruber)

  • [b00f97f9ac] - Merge pull request #85 from Level/remove/stringify-key-value (Lars-Magnus Skog)

  • [1138d6d993] - make tests more specific (Julian Gruber)

  • [45289fc325] - fix serializing and add more tests (Julian Gruber)

  • [e71e727dfb] - remove .toBuffer, add ._serialize* (Julian Gruber)

  • [32aeebf2c1] - make .toBuffer opt-in (Julian Gruber)

  • [7e48270d40] - Remove stringification of keys and values. (Julian Gruber)

  • [da6d505f1f] - readme: fix minor typos (Tim Kuijsten)

  • [f61fbcd6f7] - Merge pull request #79 from Level/checkKey (Lars-Magnus Skog)

  • [25509f8bd6] - this._checkKey does not take three parameters (Lars-Magnus Skog)

  • [48579e078d] - Merge pull request #78 from watson/patch-1 (Julian Gruber)

  • [59fd61fc8f] - Only show build status for the master branch (Thomas Watson Steen)

  • [aef56c8f80] - Merge pull request #77 from Level/deps (Julian Gruber)

  • [b12d070f9f] - memdown url (Lars-Magnus Skog)

  • [72bdb6fb38] - add dependency badge (Lars-Magnus Skog)

  • [ee16027126] - update dependencies + test on moar node verions (Lars-Magnus Skog)

  • [e5bdf0ed81] - Merge pull request #76 from Level/greenkeeper-tape-4.4.0 (Julian Gruber)

  • [1b4e38527f] - chore(package): update tape to version 4.4.0 (greenkeeperio-bot)

2.2.2 - May 13th 2015¶

2.2.1 - May 12th 2015¶

  • [e6d1cb80ea] - .throws is different for tape (Lars-Magnus Skog)

  • [a6f29b62fa] - copy paste error gave wrong test description (Lars-Magnus Skog)

2.2.0 - May 10th 2015¶

2.1.4 - Apr 28th 2015¶

  • [969116d00f] - use t.equal() with tape (Lars-Magnus Skog)

2.1.3 - Apr 28th 2015¶

  • [68096e78cd] - change from tap to tape (Lars-Magnus Skog)

2.1.2 - Apr 27th 2015¶

  • [d79c060c9d] - convert buffer to string so we can compare (Lars-Magnus Skog)

2.1.1 - Apr 27th 2015¶

  • [3881fc4290] -travis: update npm so 0.8 works, add 0.12 and iojs (Lars-Magnus Skog)

  • [9f451e8f74] - rvagg/node- -> level/ (Lars-Magnus Skog)

  • [20e91fd234] - update logo and copyright (Lars-Magnus Skog)

  • [6ccf134874] - added @watson to package.json (Rod Vagg)

2.1.0 - Nov 9th 2014¶

  • [7451cd15e6] - added @watson (Rod Vagg)

  • [f4a3346da7] - Use error test function when testing for errors (Thomas Watson Steen)

  • [24668c50e0] - Don’t fail if no value is returned by _get (Thomas Watson Steen)

  • [865ed9e777] - Use setTimeout instead of setImmediate. (Alan Gutierrez)

  • [9e9069faed] - 2.0.3 (Rod Vagg)

2.0.3 - Oct 2nd 2014¶

  • [78052c53eb] - add test for atomic batch operations (Calvin Metcalf)

2.0.1 - Sep 1st 2014¶

  • [a0b36f6a18] - Remove default options that’s too LevelDOWN specific (Thomas Watson Steen)

  • [1d97993d0b] - Allow boolean options to be falsy/truthy (Thomas Watson Steen)

  • [fb3cf56da5] - Set defaults for open, get, put, del and batch options (Thomas Watson Steen)

  • [5c2a629e2b] - Update pattern for setting default options for the iterator (Thomas Watson Steen)

2.0.0 - Aug 26th 2014¶

  • Lots of stuff between 0.11.1 and now, omitted updating changelog

  • Switch to allowing writes of empty values: null, undefined, ‘’, []

0.11.1 - Nov 15th 2013¶

  • Adjust approximate-size-test.js to account for snappy compression

0.11.0 - Oct 14th 2013¶

  • Introduce _setupIteratorOptions() method to fix options object prior to _iterator() call; makes working with gt/gte/lt/lte options a little easier (@rvagg)

0.10.2 - Sep 6th 2013¶

  • Refactor duplicated versions of isTypedArray into util.js (@rvagg)

  • Refactor duplicated versions of ‘NotFound’ checks into util.js, fixed too-strict version in get-test.js (@rvagg)

0.10.1 - Aug 29th 2013¶

  • Relax check for ‘Not Found: ‘ in error message to be case insensitive in get-test.js (@rvagg)

0.10.0 - Aug 19th 2013¶

  • Added test for gt, gte, lt, lte ranges (@dominictarr)
